subject: [sugar] Pygame Mouse Events
body:
Hi guys,I make part of a Research Groups from Brazil, USP, called LSI, and we re developting some activities to the XO, and in the last weeks I made a musical game in pygame.You can found more information on 
http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Quebra-Cabeca_Musical including the code (at googlecode qcmusical).But when I play it on my desktop, there's no errors, so i start to include it in XO, like an activity. I download the olpcgames wrapper from coderanger, and follow the steps of 
http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Game_development_HOWTO but when I start the activity I can start the game.. even the main screen load.I think this can be because this game is like an point and click game, using all the time the mouse.
So, anyone have suggestions? -- Att,Pedro Kayatt
